# zeus Provider


## Functions

- `provider::zeus::ipv4_ip2long(string)` converts dotted IPv4 to integer.
- `provider::zeus::ipv4_long2ip(int)` converts integer to dotted IPv4.


## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "zeus" {
  endpoint = "http://localhost:8080"
  token    = "changeme"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `endpoint` (String) Zeus API endpoint, e.g. http://host:port
- `token` (String, Sensitive) Bearer token for Zeus API
